form.label: BB2 Authorization Flow Dashboard
form.description: Dashboard panels related to the authorization flow log tracing

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" env=$bbEnvLabel$ host=$bbEnv$ |spath output=name path="message.auth_app_name" | table name | dedup name | sort name

h1.b: Authorization Flow Logging Event Counts - Start to Completed

tr.td: 6a. Existing Beneficiary found in BB2 User/Crosswalk Record
6b. New Beneficiary Created in BB2 User/Crosswalk Record
10. Authorization ApprovalView (redirect to bene consent form)
11. Beneficiary Authorized Application - via consent form

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/v1/o/authorize/" | search "message.response_code"!="200" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/login" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:start" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="CREATE beneficiary record" OR "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | stats count

panel.title: 6a. Existing Beneficiary record FOUND in BB2 User/Crosswalk

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | stats count

panel.title: 6b. New Beneficiary record CREATED in BB2 User/Crosswalk

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:create_beneficiary_record" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:success" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/sls-callback" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | regex "message.path"="^/v1/o/authorize/(?P<uuid>[\w-]+)/$" | search "message.location"="" | stats count

panel.title: 10. Authorization ApprovalView (redirect to bene consent form)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | regex "message.path"="^/v1/o/authorize/(?P<uuid>[\w-]+)/$" | search "message.location"!="" | stats count

panel.title: 11. Beneficiary Authorized Application - via consent form

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authorization" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="AccessToken" | search message.auth_uuid!=null | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokEpCount$, Total2=$tokTcCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/v1/o/authorize/" | timechart count

chart.title: Authorized Application Receives Token Events TIME-CHART

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="AccessToken" | search message.auth_uuid!=null | timechart count

h1.b: 1. Initial Authorization Request Events: Events for the iniital link given to the beneficiary to authorize an application by making a request to the /v1/o/authorize/ end point. This is the start of the authorization flow. The built-in testclient events are excluded (response_code=200)

search.query: | makeresults | eval Total1=$tokEpCount$ | table Total1

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/v1/o/authorize/" | search "message.response_code"="302" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokEpCount$, Total2=$tokInitOkCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | regex "message.path"="^/v1/o/authorize/$" | search "message.response_code"!="200" | stats count by message.response_code

chart.title: Events by PKCE method. S256 = Mobile App

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | regex "message.path"="^/v1/o/authorize/$" | search "message.response_code"!="200" | stats count by message.auth_pkce_method

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | regex "message.path"="^/v1/o/authorize/$" | search "message.response_code"!="200" | stats count by message.auth_app_name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | regex "message.path"="^/v1/o/authorize/$" | search "message.response_code"!="200" | table time message.auth_uuid message.auth_app_name message.ip_addr message.response_code message.path message.auth_pkce_method

h1.b: 2. MyMedicare Login Redirect Events: Events from the apps.mymedicare_cb.views.mymedicare_login() request used to redirect the beneficiary to the MyMedicare login page

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/login" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/login" | search "message.response_code"="302" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokMyMedTotalCount$, Total2=$tokMyMedOkCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/login" | stats count by message.response_code

chart.title: Events by PKCE method. S256 = Mobile App

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/login" | stats count by message.auth_pkce_method

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/login" | stats count by message.auth_app_name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/login" | table time message.auth_uuid message.auth_app_name message.ip_addr message.auth_pkce_method message.response_code message.location

h1.b: 3. Authentication Start Events: After beneficiary MyMedicare login. Events from the apps.mymedicare_cb.views.authenticate() function AFTER receiving a response from the SLS userinfo end point and BEFORE the beneficiary has been matched to a FHIR_ID with the BFD back end.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:start" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:start" | search message.sls_status="OK" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokStartTotalCount$, Total2=$tokStartOkCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

chart.title: Events with SLS MBI FORMAT VALID (true vs. false)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:start" | stats count by message.sls_mbi_format_valid

chart.title: Events with SLS MBI FORMAT SYNTHETIC (true vs. false)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:start" | stats count by message.sls_mbi_format_synthetic

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:start" | stats count by message.sls_mbi_format_msg

chart.title: Events by PKCE method. S256 = Mobile App

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:start" | stats count by message.auth_pkce_method

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:start" | stats count by message.auth_app_name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:start" | table time message.auth_app_name message.auth_uuid message.sub message.sls_status message.sls_status_mesg message.sls_mbi_format_valid message.sls_mbi_format_synthetic message.sls_mbi_format_msg message.sls_mbi_hash message.sls_hicn_hash message.auth_pkce_method

h1.b: 4. FHIR_ID Matched Events: Events from the match_fhir_id() function used to match either MBI or HICN hash to a FHIR_ID via the BFD backend.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | search "message.match_found"="true" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokFhirMatchTotalCount$, Total2=$tokFhirMatchOkCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | search "message.match_found"="true" | stats count by message.match_found

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | search "message.match_found"="true" | stats count by message.hash_lookup_type

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | search "message.match_found"="true" | stats count by message.hash_lookup_mesg

chart.title: Events by PKCE method. S256 = Mobile App

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | search "message.match_found"="true" | stats count by message.auth_pkce_method

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | search "message.match_found"="true" | stats count by message.auth_app_name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | table time message.auth_uuid message.fhir_id message.match_found message.hash_lookup_type message.auth_app_name message.hash_lookup_mesg message.mbi_hash message.hicn_hash message.auth_pkce_method

h1.b: 5. Beneficiary User/Crosswalk Retreival Events: Events using the get_and_update_user() to FIND User/Crosswalk associated with the identity information from the ID provider (SLS).

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="CREATE beneficiary record" OR "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="CREATE beneficiary record" OR "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | search "message.status"="OK" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokGetUpdateTotalCount$, Total2=$tokGetUpdateOkCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

chart.title: Events by user_id_type (Previously stored crosswalk type)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="CREATE beneficiary record" OR "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | stats count by message.crosswalk.user_id_type

chart.title: Events by hash_lookup_type (type used to match FHIR_ID)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="CREATE beneficiary record" OR "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | stats count by message.hash_lookup_type

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="CREATE beneficiary record" OR "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | stats count by message.mesg

chart.title: Events by PKCE method. S256 = Mobile App

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="CREATE beneficiary record" OR "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | stats count by message.auth_pkce_method

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="CREATE beneficiary record" OR "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | stats count by message.auth_app_name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="CREATE beneficiary record" OR "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | table time message.auth_uuid message.crosswalk.fhir_id message.crosswalk.user_id_type message.hash_lookup_type message.auth_app_name message.mesg message.mbi_hash message.hicn_hash message.auth_pkce_method

h1.b: 6a. Existing Beneficiary record FOUND in User/Crosswalk Events: Events from the get_and_update_user() function that found and/or updated an existing User/Crosswalk entry.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="RETURN existing beneficiary record" | search "message.status"="OK" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokGetUpTotalCount$, Total2=$tokGetUpOkCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

chart.title: Events by user_id_type (BEFORE: Previously stored crosswalk type)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="UPDATE mbi_hash since previous value was NULL" OR "message.mesg"="UPDATE user_id_type as it has changed from the previous lookup value" | stats count by message.crosswalk.user_id_type

chart.title: Events by hash_lookup_type (AFTER: type used to match FHIR_ID)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="UPDATE mbi_hash since previous value was NULL" OR "message.mesg"="UPDATE user_id_type as it has changed from the previous lookup value" | stats count by message.hash_lookup_type

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="UPDATE mbi_hash since previous value was NULL" OR "message.mesg"="UPDATE user_id_type as it has changed from the previous lookup value" | stats count by message.mesg

chart.title: Events by PKCE method. S256 = Mobile App

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="UPDATE mbi_hash since previous value was NULL" OR "message.mesg"="UPDATE user_id_type as it has changed from the previous lookup value" | stats count by message.auth_pkce_method

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="UPDATE mbi_hash since previous value was NULL" OR "message.mesg"="UPDATE user_id_type as it has changed from the previous lookup value" | stats count by message.auth_app_name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:get_and_update_user" | search "message.mesg"="UPDATE mbi_hash since previous value was NULL" OR "message.mesg"="UPDATE user_id_type as it has changed from the previous lookup value" | table time message.auth_uuid message.crosswalk.fhir_id message.crosswalk.user_id_type message.hash_lookup_type message.auth_app_name message.mesg message.mbi_hash message.hicn_hash message.auth_pkce_method

h1.b: 6b. New Beneficiary User/Crosswalk Created Record Events: Events from the create_beneficiary_record() function used to create a new User/Crosswalk associated with the identity information from the ID provider (SLS). New records are created for a beneficiaries first matching with the BB2 system (for their first application).

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:create_beneficiary_record" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:create_beneficiary_record" | search "message.status"="OK" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokCreateBeneTotalCount$, Total2=$tokCreateBeneOkCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:create_beneficiary_record" | stats count by message.mesg

chart.title: Events by PKCE method. S256 = Mobile App

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:create_beneficiary_record" | stats count by message.auth_pkce_medthod

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:create_beneficiary_record" | stats count by message.auth_app_name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="mymedicare_cb:create_beneficiary_record" | table time message.auth_uuid message.fhir_id message.username message.auth_app_name message.mesg mesg message.mbi_hash message.hicn_hash message.auth_pkce_method

h1.b: 7. Authentication Success - SLS-to-FHIR_ID Matched Events: Events from the apps.mymedicare_cb.views.authenticate() function AFTER the beneficiary has been successfully matched and a User/Crosswalk instance has been retreived or created.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:success" | stats count

chart.title: Events by user_id_type (hash type used to match FHIR_ID)

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:success" | stats count by message.user.crosswalk.user_id_type

chart.title: Events by PKCE method. S256 = Mobile App

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:success" | stats count by message.auth_pkce_method

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:success" | stats count by message.auth_app_name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authentication:success" | table time message.auth_uuid message.sub message.user.crosswalk.fhir_id message.user.crosswalk.user_id_type message.auth_app_name message.user.crosswalk.user_mbi_hash message.user.crosswalk.user_hicn_hash message.auth_pkce_method

h1.b: 8. MyMedicare SLS-Callback COMPLETE Request Events: Events for calls to the apps.mymedicare_cb.views.callback() view at completion. To reach this part of the flow, the beneficiary successfully authenticated with SLS after logging in to the MyMedicare site. PATH=/mymedicare/sls-callback

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/sls-callback" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/sls-callback" | search "message.response_code"="302" | stats count
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokSlsCbTotalCount$, Total2=$tokSlsCbOkCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.path" | search "message.path"="/mymedicare/sls-callback" | stats count by message.response_code

h1.b: 11. Beneficiary Authorized Application Events: Events from the apps.dot_ext.views.authorization.AuthorizationView.form_valid() method. A signal is sent to the beneficiary_authorized_application handler after the beneficiary has interacted with the consent form page. At this step the beneficiary has POSTed the consent form response to BB2.

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authorization" | stats count

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="fhir.server.authentication.match_fhir_id" | search "message.match_found"="true" | stats count by message.match_found

h1.b: 12. Authorized Application Receives Access Token Events: Events from the oauth2_provider.signals.app_authorized signal handler when a app_authorized signal is sent. This is the final step in the authorization flow.

panel.title: Authorized Application Receives Token TOTAL Events

search.query: | makeresults | eval Total1=$tokTcCount$ | table Total1
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokEpCount$ | table Total1
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokEpCount$, Total2=$tokTcCount$ | eval percent= round((Total2/Total1)*100,1) | table percent

chart.title: Events by PKCE method. S256 = Mobile App

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="AccessToken" | search message.auth_uuid!=null | stats count by message.auth_pkce_method

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="AccessToken" | search message.auth_uuid!=null | stats count by message.auth_app_name

index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="AccessToken" | search message.auth_uuid!=null | table time message.auth_uuid message.application.name message.user.username message.auth_app_name message.auth_pkce_method

h1.b: DEMOGRAPHIC SCOPES STATISTICS - By Beneficiary Consent Page/Form Choices

search.query: | makeresults | eval Total1=$tokAllowTotalCount$ | table Total1
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokDenyTotalCount$ | table Total1

| makeresults | eval totalAllow=$tokAllowTotalCount$, totalDeny=$tokDenyTotalCount$ | table totalAllowDenyChoices totalDeny totalAllow | transpose header_field="totalAllowDenyChoices" column_name="AllowDenyChoice"
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokDemoScopesTrueTotalCount$ | table Total1
| makeresults | eval Total1=$tokDemoScopesFalseTotalCount$ | table Total1

| makeresults | eval totalTrue=$tokDemoScopesTrueTotalCount$, totalFalse=$tokDemoScopesFalseTotalCount$ | table totalDemographicScopesChoices totalTrue totalFalse | transpose header_field="totalDemographicScopesChoices" column_name="DemographicScopesChoices"

h2.b: Beneficiary NOT SHARING via Consent Form (SHARE_DEMOGRAPHIC_SCOPES="False") By APPLICATION breakdown

search.query: index=bluebutton source="/var/log/pyapps/perf_mon.log*" host=$bbEnv$ env=$bbEnvLabel$ message.auth_app_name=$bbAppName$ | spath "message.type" | search "message.type"="Authorization" | search "message.share_demographic_scopes"="False" | stats count by "message.auth_app_name" | table message.auth_app_name count
